Package org.xbib.elasticsearch.index.analysis.combo

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ReaderCloneFactory.ReaderCloner<T extends Reader>
    Interface for a utility class, able to clone the content of a Reader, possibly in an optimized way (such as gaining access to a package private field, or through reflection using AccessibleObject.setAccessible(boolean)).
    ReaderCloneFactory.ReaderUnwrapper<T extends Reader>
    Interface for a utility class, able to unwrap a Reader inside another Reader.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BufferedReaderUnwrapper
    A BufferedReader ReaderUnwrapper that returns the Reader wrapped inside the BufferReader.
    CachingTokenStream
    This class can be used if the token attributes of a TokenStream are intended to be consumed more than once.
    CharArrayReaderCloner
    A ReaderCloner specialized for CharArrayReader.
    ComboAnalysisBinderProcessor  
    ComboAnalyzer
    An analyzer that combines multiple sub-analyzers into one.
    ComboAnalyzerProvider  
    ComboAnalyzerWrapper
    ElasticSearch ComboAnalyzerWrapper wrapper over Lucene ComboAnalyzerWrapper.
    ComboTokenStream
    A TokenStream combining the output of multiple sub-TokenStreams.
    FilterReaderUnwrapper
    A FilterReader ReaderUnwrapper that returns the Reader wrapped inside the FilterReader (and all its subclasses)
    PositionedTokenStream
    A TokenStream wrapper that keeps track of the current term position of the given TokenStream, and defines a comparison order.
    ReaderCloneFactory
    Duplicates Readers in order to feed multiple consumers.
    ReaderClonerDefaultImpl
    Default, memory costly but generic implementation of a Reader duplicator.
    ReusableStringReaderCloner
    A ReaderCloner specialized in duplicating Lucene's ReusableStringReader.
    ReusableTokenStreamComponents  
    ReusableTokenStreamComponents.DummyReader  
    ReusableTokenStreamComponents.DummyTokenizer  
    StringReaderCloner
    A ReaderCloner specialized for StringReader.
